text:
I would like to have top level await, so I changed the import statements and now have .mjs files. But I'm getting an error. Is it because I connected to the database first?

```Error: Cannot find module 'C:\Users\joshu\Documents\Actual Documents Folder\Dev\Ironhack\week2\day2\lab-mongoose\index.js'```
